sentences.sContent: The Republicans have stuck to their conservative agenda.
sentences.sCn: 共和党人坚持自己的保守议题。

phrases.pCn: 隐秘的议程；幕后的动机

remMethod.val: ag(做) + end(名词后缀) + a(表示名词复数) → 待做的事项 → 会议议程

trans.tranCn: 议程；日常工作事项；日程表
trans.tranOther: a list of problems or subjects that a government, organization etc is planning to deal with
